content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks! I just got back from the animal clinic where I work.
Oh cool! What kind of animals do you work with?
Mostly dogs and cats, but we also have a few rabbits, birds, and reptiles.
That sounds really interesting! I've always wanted to work with animals.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be really challenging.
I'm sure it is! I'm impressed that you're able to do it.
Thanks! I've always loved animals, so it's a dream come true for me.
That's awesome! What's your favorite animal?
I love dogs! They're so friendly and loving.
Me too! I have two dogs of my own.
Oh cool! What kind of dogs?
I have a golden retriever and a labrador retriever.
They are! They're my best friends.
